statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND temperature > 25;
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location_id = 3;
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Regular Maintenance' AND maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND maintenance_type = 'Calibration';
DELETE FROM Components WHERE location = 'Room A';
